name: 2048 for J2ME
tagline: 2048 game clone for Java ME based cell phones
body:
2048 for J2ME is a clone of the famous [2048 game](http://gabrielecirulli.github.io/2048/) for Java ME based cell phones.

It currently supports cell phones with standard keypad meeting these requirements:

* 240x320 color screen
* MIDP 2.0
* CLDC 1.1
* 2 MiB RAM
* 100 KiB of storage
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
